entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
